name: You are Here (CheshieCheshire)
description:
You are an UrbEx fanatic, travelling past all kinds of deserted locations. Recently on a hidden forum a new location was posted briefly, you managed to grab the details just before the post and user were deleted. Grabbing your trusty lock picking tools and a flashlight with some batteries you head out to take a closer look.

Once inside this now considered ancient Russian facility the gate slams shut behind you, operated electronically you must traverse the abandoned facility to find your way out.

Features:

  • Rich backstory, find slivers of the past to uncover the origins and purpose of the facility.
  • Claustrophobic atmosphere.
  • Agressive semi-intelligent AI.
  • Easter eggs!
